title: Kill Them Dead: Genesis - Episode 2
description: When asteroid mining vessel, Photon-II returns to the space station, Orion, it immediately becomes apparent that something is very wrong. A total communications blackout forces the crew of Photon-II to dock manually, however, once on board they discover that the Orion appears to be completely abandoned.David Taylor and Jason Clark split the crew into two groups to try and figure out what went down on the Orion. They soon discover that they are not alone, and that something deadly is lurking in the shadows.Now the fast paced new zombie apocalypse thriller, Kill Them Dead continues with episode 2. Find out with Jason and David what went down on the now-deserted space station and prepare yourself to be shocked to the core.WARNING: Episode 2 is the continuation of Episode 1 and cannot be read separately, so if you havenâ€™t yet grabbed a copy, do so now!Kill them Dead: Genesis is the first season of a serialized dark zombie horror. Season 1 (Genesis) consists of five bite-sized episodes that will leave you hungry for more! So dim the lights and be prepared for a sleepless night or two.*** Book contains strong language and depictions of explicit violence. For mature audiences only! ***
author: Ben Finn
